pages.text: Once you've travelled to Nowhere via a $(thing)Ruined Teleporter Frame$(), you'll find yourself in the main hub.$(br)This is a safe resting area where you can rest, relax, and take in the view of the infinite void around you.$(br2)Ahead of you will be four portals, one for each major activity area of Nowhere
pages.title: Activities

pages.text: Nowhere holds a parkour region, containing a number of courses of varying difficulty. It can be accessed through the second-left portal in the main hub.$(br)Once through, you'll find yourself in the $(thing)Parkour Lobby$(), which contains corridors marked with a number representing course difficulty. The higher the number, the harder the course
pages.title: Parkour

pages.text: Completing a course will give you an advancement related to the difficulty of that course, as well as some $(item)Dungeon Tokens$(), which can be spent in the $(thing)Utility Room$()$(br2)You can leave a course at any time by using the $(item)Return Crystal$() provided to you when you enter.

The third portal from the left holds the $(thing)Boss Lobby$(). This is a staging area with a single point of interest - a boss altar at the end of the long hallway.$(br)Using a boss soul totem on this altar will initiate a boss fight for that boss, teleporting you and anyone else with you to a random arena, along with the boss.
pages.title: Boss Arenas

pages.text: Defeating the boss awards $(item)Dungeon Tokens$() as well as the usual loot from the boss themselves.$(br2)Once you have finished the fight and are ready to return, you can do so by using the $(item)Return Crystal$() provided when you entered the arena

The utility room is found through the right-most portal in the Nowhere hub.$(br)It contains a plethora of utility blocks and stations to use, allowing you to tweak your loadouts before you attempt a boss fight or dungeon run.
pages.title: Utility Room

pages.text: The room also contains a single inhabitant; the $(l:https://adventofascension.fandom.com/wiki/Skill_Master)Skill Master$(/l).$(br)They are an unknown being that mysteriously offers to sell valuable items to you in exchange for $(item)Dungeon Tokens$(), many of which cannot be obtained elsewhere
